detectors.description:
JustSwapToken.buyToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JustSwapToken.sol#256-261) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JustSwapToken.sol#258)
detectors.markdown:
